title: Hurting My Toys: Spiritual Suicide
description: The anti-hero of Hurting My Toys is a schizophrenic psychopathic crack-head rapist/torturer/murderer. Americans have become numb to torture and suffering, but they'll change their minds if they can read this. They will never be the same. Hurting My Toys scars like a splash of boiling oil. Read as one man tries to turn into God and create a new universe.
author: David L. Tamarin
